languages.text: "Отдать тебе кое-что. Этим орудием я несла правосудие Императора, но оказалась скверным инструментом для Него. Поэтому я отдам оружие гнева Его в твои руки. Во тьме, в которую ты идешь, да защитит оно тебя от зла".

"To give you something. I used it to enact the Emperor's justice, but I proved to be a poor instrument of His will. Therefore I am handing this weapon of His wrath to you. May it protect you from evil in the darkness into which you are heading."
languages.original_text: "Отдать тебе кое-что. Этим орудием я несла правосудие Императора, но оказалась скверным инструментом для Него. Поэтому я отдам оружие гнева Его в твои руки. Во тьме, в которую ты идешь, да защитит оно тебя от зла".

languages.text: “我想送给你一件武器。我原本用它来伸张帝皇的正义，但事实证明，我并不是件称职的工具，因此，我想把祂的愤怒交到你的手中。当你即将步入黑暗之际，希望它能保护你免受邪恶所害。”
languages.original_text: "To give you something. I used it to enact the Emperor's justice, but I proved to be a poor instrument of His will. Therefore I am handing this weapon of His wrath to you. May it protect you from evil in the darkness into which you are heading."

traits.locale_text: “我想送给你一件武器。我原本用它来伸张帝皇的正义，但事实证明，我并不是件称职的工具，因此，我想把祂的愤怒交到你的手中。当你即将步入黑暗之际，希望它能保护你免受邪恶所害。”

languages.text: "Ich will Euch etwas geben. Ich habe damit die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators durchgesetzt, doch ich habe mich als schlechtes Instrument seines Willens erwiesen. Daher überreiche ich Euch die Waffe seines Zorns. Möge sie Euch in der Dunkelheit, in die Ihr zieht, vor dem Bösen beschützen."
languages.original_text: "To give you something. I used it to enact the Emperor's justice, but I proved to be a poor instrument of His will. Therefore I am handing this weapon of His wrath to you. May it protect you from evil in the darkness into which you are heading."

traits.locale_text: "Ich will Euch etwas geben. Ich habe damit die Gerechtigkeit des Imperators durchgesetzt, doch ich habe mich als schlechtes Instrument seines Willens erwiesen. Daher überreiche ich Euch die Waffe seines Zorns. Möge sie Euch in der Dunkelheit, in die Ihr zieht, vor dem Bösen beschützen."

languages.text: «Entregarle una cosa. Yo lo usaba para imponer la justicia del Emperador, pero quedó claro que no merezco ser una herramienta de Su voluntad. Por lo tanto, le hago entrega a usted de esta arma de Su cólera. Espero que le proteja de todo mal en ese lugar tenebroso al que se dirige».
languages.original_text: "To give you something. I used it to enact the Emperor's justice, but I proved to be a poor instrument of His will. Therefore I am handing this weapon of His wrath to you. May it protect you from evil in the darkness into which you are heading."

traits.locale_text: «Entregarle una cosa. Yo lo usaba para imponer la justicia del Emperador, pero quedó claro que no merezco ser una herramienta de Su voluntad. Por lo tanto, le hago entrega a usted de esta arma de Su cólera. Espero que le proteja de todo mal en ese lugar tenebroso al que se dirige».

languages.text: « Je suis venue vous donner quelque chose. Je m'en suis servie pour rendre justice au nom de l'Empereur, mais je n'ai que bien piètrement servi Sa volonté. C'est pourquoi je vous remets cette arme de Son courroux. Puisse-t-elle vous protéger du mal dans les ténèbres qui vous attendent. »
languages.original_text: "To give you something. I used it to enact the Emperor's justice, but I proved to be a poor instrument of His will. Therefore I am handing this weapon of His wrath to you. May it protect you from evil in the darkness into which you are heading."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis venue vous donner quelque chose. Je m'en suis servie pour rendre justice au nom de l'Empereur, mais je n'ai que bien piètrement servi Sa volonté. C'est pourquoi je vous remets cette arme de Son courroux. Puisse-t-elle vous protéger du mal dans les ténèbres qui vous attendent. »

languages.text: 「お前に渡すものがある。私は皇帝の正義を実現するためにこれを使ったが、皇帝の意志を伝える道具としては不十分だった。ゆえに、私はこの神の怒りの武器をお前に渡す。お前がこれから向かう闇の中で、悪からお前を守ってくれますように」
languages.original_text: "To give you something. I used it to enact the Emperor's justice, but I proved to be a poor instrument of His will. Therefore I am handing this weapon of His wrath to you. May it protect you from evil in the darkness into which you are heading."

traits.locale_text: 「お前に渡すものがある。私は皇帝の正義を実現するためにこれを使ったが、皇帝の意志を伝える道具としては不十分だった。ゆえに、私はこの神の怒りの武器をお前に渡す。お前がこれから向かう闇の中で、悪からお前を守ってくれますように」

languages.text: "Sana bir şey vermek istiyordum. Onu İmparator'un adaletini uygulamak için kullanıyordum ama meğer ben sadece O'nun isteklerini gerçekleştiren bir aletmişim. Bu yüzden O'nun hiddetini taşıyan bu silahı sana veriyorum. Gittiğin karanlıkta seni kötülükten korusun."
languages.original_text: "To give you something. I used it to enact the Emperor's justice, but I proved to be a poor instrument of His will. Therefore I am handing this weapon of His wrath to you. May it protect you from evil in the darkness into which you are heading."

traits.locale_text: "Sana bir şey vermek istiyordum. Onu İmparator'un adaletini uygulamak için kullanıyordum ama meğer ben sadece O'nun isteklerini gerçekleştiren bir aletmişim. Bu yüzden O'nun hiddetini taşıyan bu silahı sana veriyorum. Gittiğin karanlıkta seni kötülükten korusun."
